text:
Hey guys, I think I'm a bit stupid for now... does anyone know when would be the best timestamp to close a database connection during the lifecycle of a ui-extension?

... for now I have a useEffect that opens the database connection on the first mount within a serverless function ... I also close the database everytime I leave that serverless functions but that seems a bit stupid... is there a way to listen when the browsertab or the ui-extension ist closed? also when I klick on a contact and then back to the contacts overview... to be honest I'm a total beginner in react
Nope, we ended up putting the packed project onto s3 and called it good!

I did not make any changes to the example card.

I tried both `hs project dev` and `hs project upload`

it is stuck in this loading state.
